configurations.name: DTD (Document Type Definition)
configurations.description: Configuration for XML DTD documents (entities content)

configurations.name: HTML
configurations.description: HTML or XHTML documents
configurations.parametersRaw:
# Rule types that drive HTML parser behavior
# INLINE inline element
# GROUP group element
# EXCLUDE exclude this element and all children
# INCLUDE exceptions to the exclude rules
# TEXTUNIT make this element a textunit with skeleton before/after
# PRESERVE_WHITESPACE turn on preserve whitespace.
# SCRIPT Embedded scripting languatge - pass to another extractor
# SERVER Embedded server language tags such as JSP, PHP, Mason etc.
# ATTRIBUTE_TRANS, ATTRIBUTE_WRITABLE, ATTRIBUTE_READONLY, ATTRIBUTE_ID these rules list an attribute, not an element
# ATTRIBUTES_ONLY only attribute is translatable or localizable

#*********************************************************************************************
# Operators for attribute value compare
#
# Rules are of the form:
# TO_EXTRACT_ATTRIBUTE:[IF_HAS_ATTRIBUTE, OPERATOR, VALUE]
# 'content':['http-equiv', EQUALS, 'keywords']
#
# This rule would read:
# extract the value of 'content' if the value of 'http-equiv' equals 'keywords'
#
# Multiple attribute values may be included in a list:
# 'content':['http-equiv', EQUALS, ['content-language', 'content-type']]
#
# This rule would be read:
# extract the value of 'content' if the value of 'http-equiv' equals 'content-language' or 'content-type'
#*******************************************************************************************/

# EQUALS
# NOT_EQUALS
# MATCH regex match. Must match the entire attribute value

# ELEMENT AND ATTRIBUTE NAMES MUST BE LOWER CASED!!!!!!

assumeWellformed: false
preserve_whitespace: false

attributes:
  # attributes that occur on many elements
  dir:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_WRITABLE]
    allElementsExcept: [base, basefront, head, html, meta, param, script]

  title:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_TRANS]
    # HTML5 now allows title on all HTML elements
    # allElementsExcept: [base, basefront, head, html, meta, param, script, title]

  lang:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_WRITABLE]

  'xml:lang':
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_WRITABLE]

  #id:
  #  ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_ID]
  #  onlyTheseElements: [address, dt, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, legend, li, marquee, p, pre, td, th]

  aria-label:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_TRANS]

# ??? accesskey (see doc of translate)
#     https://www.w3.org/TR/html51/dom.html#the-translate-attribute
# ??? cite - Link to the source of the quotation or more information about the edit
#   it is a url, so it might be treated the same as href

elements:
  # only attributes are localizable or translatable - no PCDATA
  # ATTRIBUTES_ONLY with translatableAttributes implies the tag will be a TEXTUNIT
  # with embedded skeleton
  meta:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: {content: [[http-equiv, EQUALS, keywords], [name, EQUALS, [keywords, description, twitter:title, twitter:description, og:title, og:description, og:site_name]]]}
    writableLocalizableAttributes: {content: [http-equiv, EQUALS, [content-language, content-type]], charset}
    readOnlyLocalizableAttributes: {content: [name, EQUALS, [generator, author, progid, date]]}

  area:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [accesskey, area, alt, download]
    # download: whether to download the resource instead of navigating to it, and its file name if so

  isindex:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [prompt]

  option:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [label]

  optgroup:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [label]

  # complex TextUnit rules
  address:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  dt:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  dd:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h1:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h2:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h3:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h4:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h5:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h6:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  legend:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    translatableAttributes: [accesskey]
    idAttributes: [id]

  li:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    translatableAttributes: [value]
    idAttributes: [id]

  marquee:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  p:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]
    elementType: paragraph

  pre:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT, PRESERVE_WHITESPACE]
    idAttributes: [id]

  td:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    translatableAttributes: [abbr]
    idAttributes: [id]

  th:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]
    translatableAttributes: [abbr]

  title:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  track:
    translatableAttributes: [label, srclang]
    writableLocalizableAttributes: [src]
    # can we do "something smart" with the kind? Note?
    # this really needs a lang attribute, check that it is updated

  # inline tags
  a:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    elementType: link
    translatableAttributes: [title, accesskey, download]
    writableLocalizableAttributes: [href]

  audio:
    writableLocalizableAttributes: [src]

  abbr:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  acronym:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  applet:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [alt]

  b:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    elementType: bold

  base:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    writableLocalizableAttributes: [href]

  bdo:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  big:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  blink:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

# Seems to cause error
#  blockquote:
#    writableLocalizableAttributes: [cite]

  br:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  button:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [accesskey, value]

  cite:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  code:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  del:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  dfn:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  em:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  embed:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  font:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  i:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    elementType: italic

  iframe:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [srcdoc]
    # src doc is messy, it can be a full html doc, needs parsing.

  img:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    elementType: image
    translatableAttributes: [title, alt]
    writableLocalizableAttributes: [href, src]

  input:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes:
      alt: [type, NOT_EQUALS, [file, hidden, image, Password]]
      value: [type, NOT_EQUALS, [file, hidden, image, Password]]
      accesskey: [type, NOT_EQUALS, [file, hidden, image, Password]]
      title: [type, NOT_EQUALS, [file, hidden, image, Password]]
      placeholder: [type, NOT_EQUALS, 'dummy']

  ins:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  kbd:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  label:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [accesskey]

  map:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

# causes null pointer it seems
#  menu:
#    translatableAttributes: [label]

  menuitem:
    translatableAttributes: [label]

  nobr:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  object:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [standby]

  param:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [value]

  q:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  s:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  samp:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  small:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  select:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  span:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  spacer:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  strike:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  strong:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  sub:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  sup:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  table:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [summary]

  textarea:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [accesskey, placeholder]

  tt:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  u:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    elementType: underlined

  var:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  wbr:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  # Ruby inline tags
  ruby:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  rb:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  rt:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  rc:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  rp:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  rbc:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  rtc:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  # Robo help inline tags
  symbol:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  face:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  # Excluded elements
  '.*':
    ruleTypes: [EXCLUDE]
    conditions: [translate, EQUALS, 'no']

  # Included elements (must have both rules!!!)
  '.+':
      ruleTypes: [INCLUDE]
      conditions: [translate, EQUALS, 'yes']

  style:
    ruleTypes: [EXCLUDE]

  stylesheet:
    ruleTypes: [EXCLUDE]

  # javascript etc.
  script:
    ruleTypes: [EXCLUDE]

# Todo, complicated:
# styles in the style attribute and element
# need updating for directions, alignemnts, offsets, margins (rtl)
# Take a look at CSSJanus: https://github.com/cssjanus/cssjanus
# Also need translation for 'content'
# Might also be nice to change fonts

configurations.name: Standard HTML5
configurations.description: Configuration for standard HTML5 documents.
configurations.parametersRaw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!-- Default rules for HTML5 -->
<!-- All configurations to use with the HTML5+ITS filter MUST map 'h' to the HTML namespace. -->
<its:rules xmlns:its="http://www.w3.org/2005/11/its" version="2.0"
 xmlns:h="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
 
 <!-- Inline elements
 <its:withinTextRule withinText="yes"
  selector="//h:abbr | //h:acronym | //h:br | //h:cite | //h:code | //h:dfn
  | //h:kbd | //h:q | //h:samp | //h:span | //h:strong | //h:var | //h:b | //h:em
  | //h:big | //h:hr | //h:i | //h:small | //h:sub | //h:sup | //h:tt | //h:del
  | //h:ins | //h:bdo | //h:img | //h:a | //h:font | //h:center | //h:s | //h:strike
  | //h:u | //h:isindex" />
  -->
  
 <!-- Non-translatable elements -->
 <its:translateRule selector="//h:script|//h:style" translate="no"/>
 
 <its:translateRule selector="//h:del" translate="no"/>
 <its:translateRule selector="//h:del/descendant-or-self::*/@*" translate="no"/>
 
 <!-- Translatable attribute -->
 <its:translateRule selector="//h:*/@abbr|//h:*/@alt|//h:*/@prompt|//h:*/@standby|//h:*/@summary|//h:*/@title" translate="yes"/>
 
 <its:translateRule selector="//h:meta[@name='keywords']/@content" translate="yes"/>
 <its:translateRule selector="//h:meta[@name='description']/@content" translate="yes"/>
		     
 <!-- Attributes for the input element -->
 <its:translateRule selector="//h:input/@value" translate="yes"/>
 <its:translateRule selector="//h:input[@type='hidden']/@value" translate="no"/>
 
 <!-- Bidirectional information. Note: No direct support for 'auto' value -->
 <its:dirRule selector="//h:*[@dir='ltr']" dir="ltr"/>
 <its:dirRule selector="//h:*[@dir='rtl']" dir="rtl"/>
 <its:dirRule selector="//h:bdo[@dir='ltr']" dir="lro"/>
 <its:dirRule selector="//h:bdo[@dir='rtl']" dir="rlo"/>

 <!-- Note: dfn and dt don't match exactly the Terminology data category -->
  
 <!-- Id Value -->
 <its:idValueRule selector="//h:*[@id]" idValue="@id"/>
 
 <!-- Preserve space -->
 <its:preserveSpaceRule selector="//h:pre|//h:textarea" space="preserve"/>
 
 <!-- Domain -->
 <its:domainRule selector="/h:html"
 	domainPointer="/h:html/h:head/h:meta[@name='dcterms.subject' or @name='keywords']/@content"/>

</its:rules>

configurations.name: Plain Text (Regex, Line=Paragraph)
configurations.description: Plain Text Filter using regex-based linebreak search. Extracts by lines.
configurations.parametersRaw:
#v1
unescapeSource.b=true
trimLeading.b=false
trimTrailing.b=false
preserveWS.b=true
useCodeFinder.b=false
codeFinderRules=#v1$0a$count.i=2$0a$rule0=%(([-0+#]?)[-0+#]?)((\d\$)?)(([\d\*]*)(\.[\d\*]*)?)[dioxXucsfeEgGpn]$0a$rule1=(\\r\\n)|\\a|\\b|\\f|\\n|\\r|\\t|\\v$0a$sample=$0a$useAllRulesWhenTesting.b=false
wrapMode.i=0
rule=(^(?=.+))(.*?)$
sourceGroup.i=2
regexOptions.i=8
sample=$0d$$0a$This is the first sentence. And this is the second one.$0d$$0a$Second paragraph. Each one ends at the line-break.$0d$$0a$$0d$$0a$Third paragraph.$0d$$0a$And the last paragraph may have no line-break.
parametersClass=net.sf.okapi.filters.plaintext.regex.Parameters

configurations.name: RESX
configurations.description: Configuration for Microsoft RESX documents (without binary data).
configurations.parametersRaw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<its:rules xmlns:its="http://www.w3.org/2005/11/its"
 xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"
 xmlns:itsx="http://www.w3.org/2008/12/its-extensions"
 xmlns:okp="okapi-framework:xmlfilter-options"
 its:translate="no" version="1.0">

<!-- This is a set of rules to process .ResX files. Be aware that any text in Base64 entries
like text items declared in a list box, will not be processed using this method.
These rules can also be used on simple .resx files that have just string entries.  -->
  
 <its:translateRule selector="/root" translate="no"/>
 <its:translateRule selector="//data[not(@type) and not(starts-with(@name, '>'))]/value" translate="yes" itsx:idValue="../@name"/>
 <its:translateRule selector="//data[@mimetype]/value" translate="no"/>
 <its:translateRule selector="//data[substring(@name, string-length(@name) - string-length('.Name')+1)='.Name']/value" translate="no"/>
 <its:translateRule selector="//data[@name='$this.Text']/value" translate="yes" itsx:idValue="../@name"/>
 
 <!-- Localization notes -->
 <its:locNoteRule locNoteType="description"
  locNotePointer="../comment" selector="//data[not(@type) and not(starts-with(@name, '>') or starts-with(@name, '$'))]/value"/>
<okp:codeFinder useCodeFinder="yes">#v1
count.i=2
rule0=(\{[^}]+?\})
rule1=\<(/?)\w+[^>]*?>
</okp:codeFinder>
</its:rules>

</its:rules>

configurations.name: Android Strings
configurations.description: Configuration for Android Strings XML documents.
configurations.parametersRaw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
<its:rules xmlns:its="http://www.w3.org/2005/11/its"
	   xmlns:itsx="http://www.w3.org/2008/12/its-extensions"
	   xmlns:a="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
	   xmlns:okp="okapi-framework:xmlfilter-options"
	   version="1.0">
  <its:translateRule selector="/*" translate="no"/>
  <its:translateRule selector="//*/@a:text[not(starts-with(.,'@'))]" translate="yes" itsx:whiteSpaces="preserve" />
  <its:translateRule selector="//string[not(@product)]" translate="yes" itsx:idValue="./@name" itsx:whiteSpaces="preserve" />
  <its:translateRule selector="//string[@product]" translate="yes" itsx:idValue="concat(@name, '_', @product)" itsx:whiteSpaces="preserve" />
  <its:translateRule selector="//item[@quantity]" translate="yes" itsx:idValue="concat(../@name, '_', @quantity)" itsx:whiteSpaces="preserve" />
  <its:translateRule selector="//item[not(@quantity)]" translate="yes" itsx:idValue="concat(../@name, '_', count(preceding-sibling::item))" itsx:whiteSpaces="preserve" />
  <its:withinTextRule selector="//string/descendant::*|//item/descendant::*" withinText="yes"/>
  <its:translateRule selector="//*[@translatable = 'false']" translate="no"/>
  <okp:codeFinder useCodeFinder="yes">#v1
count.i=2
rule0=%(([-0+#]?)[-0+#]?)((\d\$)?)(([\d\*]*)(\.[\d\*]*)?)[dioxXucsfeEgGpn]
rule1=\{\d.*?\}
  </okp:codeFinder>
</its:rules>

configurations.name: WiX Localization
configurations.description: Configuration for WiX (Windows Installer XML) Localization files.
configurations.parametersRaw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<its:rules xmlns:its="http://www.w3.org/2005/11/its"
	       xmlns:itsx="http://www.w3.org/2008/12/its-extensions"
           xmlns:w="http://schemas.microsoft.com/wix/2006/localization"
           its:translate="no" version="1.0">

</its:rules>

configurations.name: Apple Stringsdict
configurations.description: Configuration for Apple Stringsdict files
configurations.parametersRaw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
<its:rules
    xmlns:its="http://www.w3.org/2005/11/its"
    xmlns:itsx="http://www.w3.org/2008/12/its-extensions"
    xmlns:okp="okapi-framework:xmlfilter-options"
    version="1.0">
  
  <its:translateRule selector="/plist/dict/dict/string"
                     translate="yes"
                     itsx:idValue="concat(
                                   ../preceding-sibling::key[position()=1],
                                   '_',
                                   preceding-sibling::key[position()=1])"/>

  <its:translateRule selector="/plist/dict/dict/dict/string"
                     translate="yes"
                     itsx:idValue="concat(
                                   ../../preceding-sibling::key[position()=1],
                                   '_',
                                   ../preceding-sibling::key[position()=1],
                                   '_',
                                   preceding-sibling::key[position()=1])"/>
  
  <!-- Do not translate strings for keys NSStringFormatSpecTypeKey, NSStringFormatValueTypeKey -->
  <its:translateRule selector="//dict/dict/key[. = 'NSStringFormatSpecTypeKey' or . = 'NSStringFormatValueTypeKey']/following-sibling::string[position()=1]"
                     translate="no"/>
  <its:translateRule selector="//key" translate="no"/>

  <okp:codeFinder useCodeFinder="yes">#v1
count.i=4
rule0=%(([-0+#]?)[-0+#]?)((\d\$)?)(([\d\*]*)(\.[\d\*]*)?)[dioxXucsfeEgGpn@]
rule1=(\\r\\n)|\\a|\\b|\\f|\\n|\\r|\\t|\\v
rule2=\<(/?)\w+[^>]*?>
rule3=%\d?\$?#@[^@]+@
  </okp:codeFinder>
</its:rules>

configurations.name: DocBook
configurations.description: Configuration for DocBook v5 files
configurations.parametersRaw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
<its:rules version="1.0" xmlns:its="http://www.w3.org/2005/11/its"
		   xmlns:itsx="http://www.w3.org/2008/12/its-extensions"
		   xmlns:db="http://docbook.org/ns/docbook">
	<!-- Inline elements -->
	<its:withinTextRule selector="
	//db:abbrev|//db:acronym|//db:emphasis|//db:phrase|//db:quote|//db:trademark|
	//db:ancor|//db:citation|//db:citerefentry|//db:citetitle|//db:firstterm|//db:glossterm|//db:link|//db:olink|//db:xref|
	//db:foreignphrase|//db:wordasword|//db:computeroutput|//db:literal|//db:markup|//db:prompt|//db:replaceable|//db:tag|//db:userinput|
	//db:inlineequation|//db:mathphrase|//db:subscript|//db:superscript|
	//db:accel|//db:guibutton|//db:guiicon|//db:guilabel|//db:guimenu|//db:guimenuitem|//db:guisubmenu|
	//db:keycap|//db:keycode|//db:keycombo|//db:keysym|//db:menuchoice|//db:mousebutton|//db:shortcut|
	//db:classname|//db:constant|//db:errorcode|//db:errorname|//db:errortype|//db:function|
	//db:msgtext|//db:parameter|//db:property|//db:replaceable|//db:returnvalue|//db:symbol|//db:token|//db:type|//db:varname|
	//db:application|//db:comand|//db:envar|//db:filename|//db:msgtext|//db:option|//db:parameter|//db:prompt|//db:systemitem|
	//db:database|//db:email|//db:hardware|//db:optional"
						withinText="yes"/>

	<!-- Elements that should not be translated. -->
	<its:translateRule selector="
	//db:computeroutput|//db:programlisting|//db:screen|//db:screenshot|//db:synopsis|
	//db:literallayout|
	//db:mathphrase/*|//db:inlineequation/*" translate="no"/>

	<!-- These should be translated and the spaces have to be preserved. -->
	<!-- Currently, literallayout would be the only one where the spaces should be preserved
		 but it is set not to be translated, as it is listed in translateRule/@selector above.
	     To make literallayout translatable, remove it from the selector and uncomment the line below. -->
	<!-- its:preserveSpaceRule selector="//db:literallayout" space="preserve"/ -->

	<!-- These elements should generate a separate flaw of text.
		 Based on https://www.w3.org/TR/xml-i18n-bp/#docbook
	     ITSFilter DOES NOT HANDLE withinText="nested" as of March 2021, however,
	     and this has no real effect. -->
	<its:withinTextRule withinText="nested" selector="
	//db:alt|
	//db:footnote|
	//db:remark|
	//db:indexterm|
	//db:primary|
	//db:secondary|
	//db:tertiary"/>
</its:rules>

configurations.name: XML Stream
configurations.description: Large XML Documents
configurations.parametersRaw:
assumeWellformed: true
preserve_whitespace: false

attributes:
  # attributes that can appear anywhere
  'xml:lang':
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_WRITABLE]
  
  # This rule will not apply unless TEXT_UNIT element rules are defined which may have an id
  'xml:id':
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_ID]
  'id':
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_ID]
  
  'xml:space':
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_PRESERVE_WHITESPACE]
    preserve: ['xml:space', EQUALS, preserve]
    default: ['xml:space', EQUALS, default]

configurations.name: DITA
configurations.description: DITA XML
configurations.parametersRaw:
assumeWellformed: true
preserve_whitespace: false

attributes:
  # attributes that can appear anywhere
  'xml:lang':
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_WRITABLE]
  
  # This rule will not apply unless TEXT_UNIT element rules are defined which may have an id
  'xml:id':
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_ID]
  'id':
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_ID]
  
  'xml:space':
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_PRESERVE_WHITESPACE]
    preserve: ['xml:space', EQUALS, preserve]
    default: ['xml:space', EQUALS, default]

elements:
  # translatable attributes
  othermeta:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [content]
  
  topicref:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [navtitle]
  
  topicgroup:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [navtitle]
  
  topichead:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [navtitle]
    
  note:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [othertype]
  
  lq:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [reftitle]
  
  object:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [standby]
  
  map:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [title]
   
  state:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY, INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [value]

  data:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [label]
  
  vrm:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [version]
    
  # pre-formatted elements
  pre:
    ruleTypes: [PRESERVE_WHITESPACE]
  lines:
    ruleTypes: [PRESERVE_WHITESPACE]
  screen:
    ruleTypes: [PRESERVE_WHITESPACE]
  msgblock:
    ruleTypes: [PRESERVE_WHITESPACE]
  codeblock:
    ruleTypes: [PRESERVE_WHITESPACE]

  # exclusion rules
  '.*':
    ruleTypes: [EXCLUDE]
    conditions: [translate, EQUALS, 'no']

  # '.+' is a trick to have same regex as above.
  # hashmap doesn't allow duplicates
  '.+':
    ruleTypes: [INCLUDE]
    conditions: [translate, EQUALS, 'yes']
  
  stylesheet:
    ruleTypes: [EXCLUDE]
  
  coords:
    ruleTypes: [EXCLUDE]
    
  draft-comment:
    ruleTypes: [EXCLUDE]
    
  required-cleanup:
    ruleTypes: [EXCLUDE]
    
  shape:
    ruleTypes: [EXCLUDE]
    
  # inline elements
  alt:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
  
  apiname:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
  
  b:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
  
  boolean:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
  
  cite:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
  
  cmdname:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
  
  codeph:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
  
  delim:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
  
  filepath:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
  
  fragref:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
  
  i:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
  
  image:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [alt]
    conditions: [placement, NOT_EQUALS, break]
  
  itemgroup:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
  
  keyword:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
  
  kwd:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
  
  menucascade:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
  
  msgnum:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
  
  msgph:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
  
  oper:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
  
  option:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
  
  parmname:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
  
  ph:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
  
  q:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
  
  repsep:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
  
  sep:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
  
  shortcut:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  sub:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
  
  sup:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
  
  synnoteref:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
  
  synph:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
  
  systemoutput:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
  
  term:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
  
  tm:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
  
  tt:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
  
  u:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
  
  uicontrol:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
  
  userinput:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
  
  var:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
  
  varname:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
  
  wintitle:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
  
  xref:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
